title: Ambient Video Game Music - Estuary 2
description: Dive deeper into the serene world of estuaries with this sequel to our popular collection of 10 ambience tracks.
longDescription:
Dive deeper into the serene world of estuaries with this sequel to our popular collection of 10 ambience tracks, each designed to further enhance the tranquil, dynamic nature of these unique environments. Developed with game developers in mind, this collection intricately weaves the harmonious sounds of waterfowl, flowing water, and varying intensities of rain showers, providing players with an even more immersive exploration of estuarine landscapes.


In this sequel, each track intensifies the captivating estuarine soundscape. The vibrant calls of waterfowl are more varied and authentic, their echoes resonating over serene waters and infusing the environment with a sense of vibrant life. The gentle flow of water is captured with even more nuance, embodying the tranquillity of estuaries in greater depth.


The touch of occasional rain showers is portrayed with more detail in this collection. The soft patter of rain on the water surface, its rhythm nuanced and varied, adds a sensory richness that mirrors the unpredictable, yet soothing weather patterns of these transitional ecosystems.


This sequel is an indispensable tool for game developers aiming to create authentic and deeply immersive estuary environments. The detailed sounds of waterfowl, flowing water, rain showers, and the harmonious soundtrack, provide players with an even more authentic estuarine experience. Every exploration or quest in these environments becomes a journey of tranquillity and vibrant life, making each gaming experience as soothing as it is engaging.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
